subject: Scan Rate Chip on 12-470:  Results?
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Frank R, Steve H, Mike C - have any of you (or anyone else) tried the 
(Sum Duc) chip that enables scan rate adjustment on the Radio Shack 
Hacks?  If so, was it helpful...did it enable you to improve results?  

Some feedback, please...thanks.  ;)

LC
